remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  Show that f(x) is one-to-one on ` P .\/ Q ` line.  TODO:  FIX COMMENT Use proof idea from ~ cdleme32sn1awN .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2013.)
